scripts.deploy:local: dotenv -e ../../.env -c anvil -- sh -c 'npm run build && mud deploy --profile=local --worldAddress ${WORLD_ADDRESS} --alwaysRunPostDeploy'
scripts.deploy:testnet: dotenv -e ../../.env -c testnet -- sh -c 'npm run build && mud deploy --profile=testnet --worldAddress ${WORLD_ADDRESS} --alwaysRunPostDeploy'
